trans-unit.source: Move all <token>ssSDS</token> servers from one subscription to a different subscription.
trans-unit.target: Move all <token>ssSDS</token> servers from one subscription to a different subscription.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>Change Subscription</legacyBold> request must be specified as follows:
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>Change Subscription</legacyBold> request must be specified as follows:

trans-unit.source: Replace <legacyItalic>{subscriptionId}</legacyItalic> with the source subscription ID (the target subscription ID is specified in the request body).
trans-unit.target: Replace <legacyItalic>{subscriptionId}</legacyItalic> with the source subscription ID (the target subscription ID is specified in the request body).

trans-unit.source: If the operation returns success, the operation is complete and changes are effective immediately.
trans-unit.target: If the operation returns success, the operation is complete and changes are effective immediately.

trans-unit.source: If the operation fails because of a user error, no changes are applied.
trans-unit.target: If the operation fails because of a user error, no changes are applied.

trans-unit.source: If there is a communication error or internal server error, you should check the status of the operation using <link xlink:href="4311fa65-6bc7-4ad6-8cd3-0f12ccc65086" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Servers</link>.
trans-unit.target: If there is a communication error or internal server error, you should check the status of the operation using <link xlink:href="4311fa65-6bc7-4ad6-8cd3-0f12ccc65086" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Servers</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the required and optional request headers:
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the required and optional request headers:

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <legacyBold>2012-03-01</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <legacyBold>2012-03-01</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body:
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body:

trans-unit.source: The subscription ID to move the servers to.
trans-unit.target: The subscription ID to move the servers to.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the database management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the database management service.

trans-unit.source: This request id is used for request tracking.
trans-unit.target: This request id is used for request tracking.

trans-unit.source: If a failure occurs that requires the user to contact <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=1782</linkUri></externalLink>, the request id should be provided to Microsoft to assist in tracking and resolving the failure for the request.
trans-unit.target: If a failure occurs that requires the user to contact <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=1782</linkUri></externalLink>, the request id should be provided to Microsoft to assist in tracking and resolving the failure for the request.

trans-unit.source: The following console application transfers all servers from one subscription to another.
trans-unit.target: The following console application transfers all servers from one subscription to another.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>{subscriptionId}</embeddedLabel>– replace with the subscription identifier for your subscription.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>{subscriptionId}</embeddedLabel>– replace with the subscription identifier for your subscription.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>{newSubscriptionId}</embeddedLabel>– replace with the new subscription identifier to be associated with the server.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>{newSubscriptionId}</embeddedLabel>– replace with the new subscription identifier to be associated with the server.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>{thumbprint}</embeddedLabel>– replace with the thumbprint of a management certificate in your subscription.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>{thumbprint}</embeddedLabel>– replace with the thumbprint of a management certificate in your subscription.
